paragraphs.text: %sql SELECT title, count(itemId) as count FROM item_ratings_temp JOIN items_temp ON (item_ratings_temp.itemId = items_temp.id) GROUP BY title ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 5

result.msg:
title	count
Johnny Depp	1
Rosalind Allen	1
Leonardo DiCaprio	1
Keshia Knight Pulliam	1
Clive Owen	1

paragraphs.title: Save Top-K Recs to elasticSearch
paragraphs.text:
import org.elasticsearch.spark.sql._
import org.apache.spark.sql.SaveMode

val esConfig = Map("pushdown" -> "true", "es.nodes" -> "127.0.0.7", "es.port" -> "9200")
mostDesirableItemsByRatingsDF.write.format("org.elasticsearch.spark.sql").mode(SaveMode.Overwrite).options(esConfig).save("advancedspark/top-users-by-count")

result.msg:
import org.elasticsearch.spark.sql._
import org.apache.spark.sql.SaveMode
esConfig: scala.collection.immutable.Map[String,String] = Map(pushdown -> true, es.nodes -> 127.0.0.7, es.port -> 9200)

name: Live Ratings/02: Top-K Recommendations By Ratings (Summary Statistics)
